Luma API¶

The Luma API contains documentation for modules that can be useful for Luma developers as well as independent Plugin developers. The API is supposed to be supplementary to the Luma Development section.

Contents¶

  • The luma.base.backend package
    • LDAP connections
    • LDAP server representation
  • The luma.base.gui package
    • Application settings
    • Plugin settings
  • The luma.base.util package
    • Internationalization
    • X11 user interface integration
    • Filepaths
